problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in the parallelogram ABCD, AB = N_0, the bisector of ∠BAD and the extended line of BC intersect at point E, and DC at point F, and DF: CF = N_1, DG ⊥ AE, and the vertical foot is G , If DG = N_2, then the length of AE is ()
raw_answer: 解:∵AE为∠DAB的平分线,∴∠DAE=∠BAE,∵DC∥AB,∴∠BAE=∠DFA,∴∠DAE=∠DFA,∴AD=FD,∵DG⊥AE,∴AG=FG,∵四边形ABCD是平行四边形,∴AB=DC=4,AD∥BC,∵DF:CF=3:1,∴DF=3,CF=1,∵DG=1,∴GF=√{3²-1²}=2√{2},∴AF=2GF=4√{2},∵AD∥BC,∴△ADF∽△ECF,∴CF:DF=EF:AF=1:3,即EF:4√{2}=1:3,∴EF=\frac{4√{2}}{3},∴AE=AF+EF=4√{2}+\frac{4√{2}}{3}=\frac{16√{2}}{3},故选:B．
